resources.string: Are you sure to clear log and log_out folder?

Are you sure to get qxdm log? Remember to deselect this option after the test and reboot the phone, otherwise it will comsume 20mA standby current. And be careful of the large flash memory comsume under the log folder. Confirm to select the *.cfg file at first!
(Recommend do not use in customer end!)Are you sure to enable ramdump option? You need to use QPST Configuration software to dump it when system Crash!
Log is not running. You can click the start button on left-up corner.
The logging is stoped. The log size over limit. Need to backup log to PC and clear log at first!
The logging is stoped. The storage is not enough(less than 512MB). Need to backup log to PC and clear log at first! Log folder size:
It will compress log folder to log_out foler!
Compress done! Result under at log_out folder.
It will check the crash issue on the log folder. It will take a few minutes to get the result. I will show dialog when it is done!
Need to stop the logging at first!

"1:function button：start/stop,delete,compress,crash check 2:log normal options：main, kernel,other. Recommend setting on. 3:Qxdm option: capture modem log, detailed on option check guide 4:Ramdump option：end customer please do not set. With strictly test condition, it will trigger more crash. Crash into ramdump mode, and we can capture ramdump log. It will restart when it is done. Otherwise, you need to long press powerkey to restart. 5:log size limit：Over limit, it will hint you cannot start the loggering.Please backup and clear the log."
Please backup! Or it will delete log_out folder under internal SD card!
also clear the origrin under data patition (recommend not slect, for repaired phone)
